name: Cold Outside
description:
The inspiration for this piece was a crumpled photo of a baby that I found discarded in the street. It made me think of all the children who are not cherished and I decided to make a token home for this little one. The shantung covered box houses some of the simple things that can make a child happy: love, toys and a small book.

The blocks are made from a solar plate etching attached to foam board. One side is printed in black, on the other it is black and pink. The box is lined with paper from an art magazine and one of my own photographs has been used on the inside lid. The little baby's frame is made from vellum covered card and the handmade box is covered in silk bookcloth.

The work can be displayed in various ways, for example with the blocks vertically, or lying flat in the box.

The box is 5 x 23.5 x 19.5 cm (2" x 9.5" x 7.7"), the print is approx 15cm (6") square and the photograph is the size of a passport photo

************
Postage by ordinary mail is included in the price. Contact me if you would prefer Express Port or Registered Mail. Artwork are enclosed in acid proof tissue and placed between rigid boards for protection during transit.

************

All my work is hand made using fine paper, cloth, leather and other tactile materials. My prints are often unique though I sometimes make small editions. I make artists books which are written, illustrated and bound by me, and design bindings which are published texts bound by me in a manner that reflects my interpretation of the book's content.

Please contact me if you have any questions about technique, or would like more information about an item.

When you purchase artwork from this site you are purchasing the artistic work only, not the rights to it.

name: Dragonfly Light
description:
This delicate etching of a dragonfly on a dreamy background is printed in black and yellow ochre. The dragonfly was drawn into a hard ground, the background was developed with spit bite and aquatint.

This is a unique print, one of a series made from the same plate. 
The sheet of paper is quite long so the print could be hung without a frame or you could trim it to fit a frame if preferred.

Paper: Canson Edition 250gsm
Image: 19.5 x 24.5 cm (7.7 x 9.6 in)
Paper: 57 x 37.5 cm (22.5 x 14.7 in)
Colours: black, grey, yellow ochre
Printed: March 2011

Print is not framed. The print as shown on the wall is simply shown this way so you can see how it might look.

************
The postage cost is for ordinary mail. Contact me if you would prefer Express Port or Registered Mail. Prints are enclosed in acid proof tissue and placed between rigid boards to protect them during transit.

************
All my work is hand made using fine paper, cloth, leather and other tactile materials. My prints are often unique though I sometimes make small editions. As well as making prints, I make artists books which are written, illustrated and bound by me, and design bindings which are published texts bound by me in a manner that reflects my interpretation of the book's content.

Please contact me if you have any questions about technique, or would like more information about an item.

name: Game Boy Scrambled
description:
A young mind; ideas coiled, intertwined, bursting out of his head. 

Printed on an etching press using a collagraph plate with strands of linen thread to emboss the lines. The pattern and texture come from silk fabric on the background and a gritty surface on the boy's face.

*******************
This print is unique; it's one of a series related to our hopes for the future. Printed: April 2011

Paper: Canson Ã‰dition 250gsm
Image: 21 x 20 cm (8.3 x 7.9 in)
Paper: 32 x 27 cm (12.6 x 10.65 in)
Colours: black, vibrant red, white, grey

Print is not framed.

name: Swing II
description:
An abstract print waiting for your imagination. I see a spark of hope among the chaos. What do you see? A study in colour and texture, this print is sure to intrigue. It would be ideal in a study or office

"Swing II" a unique print, one of a series of monoprints; it is not part of an edition.

The print in the photograph is attached to a blank canvas with small magnets. This an easy way to hang or display small prints before you frame them.

Paper: Canson Edition 250gsm
Image: 18 x 18.5 cm (7 x 7.5 in)
Paper: 18 x 18.5 cm (7 x 7.5 in)
Colours: black, gold, red, pink, tan
Printed: November 2011

The print is not framed and the listing is for a single print. Contact me if you would like to see some more prints in this series.

************

name: Australia Suite Design Binding
description:
Illustrated book bound in gold with an exposed spine. The text is "Australia Suite" written by Lynn Hard with drawings by Garry Shead. 76 pages. Signed by the Author and Artist.

The binding is made from gilded boards held together with scrim which is usually hidden by the spine. Linen and silk thread, and embossed lines on the boards, are used to reflect Shead's linear drawing style. The inside boards are covered in distressed silver coloured leaf. Finished with traditional shellac for protection.

The binding has a lovely textured appearance thanks to some of the bole being left exposed and rubbing back to enhance the colour.

26 cm x 21.5cm (approx 10.2" x 8.5")

Contact me if you'd like more information or photos. This piece was included in the "Australia Suite" exhibition at the Maitland Regional Gallery 2010. See the YouTube site for some views of the exhibition. 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cFgux3kSlnc

************
Postage by ordinary mail is included in the price. Contact me if you would prefer Express Port or Registered Mail. Artwork are enclosed in acid proof tissue and placed between rigid boards for protection during transit.
